summary: This mod transforms your pit-bull like Sabrecats into actual Smilodons by replacing the vanilla skeleton with a more feline like skeleton.  Guaranteed to boost your immersion 101%
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][size=5][b] [center][ [ [Mod Author [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/20882614]Rougeshot[/url]﻿ ] ] ][/center][/b][/size][/color]

[color=#d9ead3][size=4][b]Hello fellow modders, I'm Rougeshot and I'm open to[/b][b] any feedback or[/b][b] constructive criticism you may have, but keep in mind that I have a full time career and am in college part time, so it may be a while before I can respond to any comments or questions you may have.  Please be patient with any questions or concerns and I will respond as soon as I am able. 

[/b][/size][/color][b][size=4][color=#d9ead3]﻿And if you enjoy the mod hit that [/color][color=#00ff00]thumbs up[/color][color=#d9ead3] button so that your fellow modders will have easier time finding this mod among the thousands of others.[/color][/size][/b][center][b]
[/b][b][color=#00ff00][size=4]Thank you so much for your support.[/size][/color][/b][size=4]﻿[/size]


[size=6][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18429]IMMERSIVE SMILODONS SPECIAL EDITION[/url]﻿[/b][/size][/center][center]

[color=#00ffff][size=6][b][ [ [ MOD DESCRIPTION] ] ][/b][/size][/color]
[b]
[/b][size=4][b]If your like me have been disappointed with the vanilla Sabre-cats then this mod is for you.  This mod replaces the vanilla pit-bull like skeleton with a new more historically accurate feline skeleton.  After looking through tons of pictures, sculptures and paintings and working within the confines of the vanilla mesh, I enlarged the limbs, neck and skull of the Sabre-cat and the result was an actual Smilodon that will strike fear throughout Skyrim and the modding community.[/b]
[/size]

[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]SEEING IS BELIEVING!!![/size][/color]


[color=#fff2cc][size=5]VANILLA[/size]
[/color][size=4](Pit-Bull Like)[/size]

[/b][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92326/92326-1530724917-488605035.jpeg[/img]﻿[/center][center]


[color=#00ff00][b][size=5]MODDED!!!
(Smilodon)[/size]

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92326/92326-1530724470-193648857.jpeg[/img]﻿
[/b][/color][b]
[color=#00ff00][size=5]This replaces all Sabre-cats in game![/size][/color]
[/b]


[color=#00ffff][size=6][b][ [ [ MOD COMPATIBILITY] ] ] 

[/b][/size][/color][size=5][b]Immersive Smilodons uses a custom skeleton for the vanilla Sabre-cats and will overwrite any mod that makes changes to the vanilla Sabre-cat skeleton.  Mods that make sweeping changes to vanilla skeletons e.g."Realistic Ragdoll and Force" [/b][color=#ffff00][b]should be compatible as long as "Immersive Smilodons" is installed after those mods and allowed to overwite there files.[/b][/color]

[b][color=#ffff00]Should be fully compatible with any texture mods, since this mod contains no textures of it's own only a skeleton.  Which also makes it compatible with most other creature mods that do not edit vanilla skeletons.[/color]

Here are just a few that I know are compatible.

[color=#1e84cc] FusaFusa Project[/color][color=#ffff00] -[/color][color=#00ff00] Compatible
[/color]
[color=#1e84cc]Immersive creatures[/color] - [color=#00ff00]Compatible
[/color]
[color=#1e84cc]Monster Mod[/color][color=#ffff00] -[/color] [color=#00ff00]Compatible

[/color][color=#1e84cc]SkyTest -Realistic Animals and Predators [/color]- [color=#00ff00]Compatible

[/color][color=#1e84cc]SkyTest -Harder Creatures[/color] -[color=#00ff00] Compatible[/color]
[/b][/size]


[color=#00ffff][size=6][b][ [ [ INSTALLATION ] ] ]

[/b][/size][/color][size=5][b]Recommend using Nexus Mod Manager or your favorite mod manager.

[/b][/size][b][size=5][color=#fce5cd]Install my mod[/color][color=#ffff00][u] after[/u] [/color][color=#fce5cd]any mod that makes changes to the vanilla Saber-Cats and[/color][color=#ff7700] [/color][color=#ffff00]click "Yes to all"[/color][color=#fce5cd] when prompted to overwrite any files.[/color]
[/size][color=#fce5cd][size=5]There is no ".esp" plugin with this mod.

[/size]
[/color][/b][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][b][color=#00ffff][size=6][ [ [ MY OTHER MOD] ] ]

[/size][/color][/b][color=#fff2cc][b][size=5]If you like this mod then I'm sure you'll enjoy my other mod. 

[/size][/b][/color][b][color=#00ffff][size=6][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/93384?tab=description]Supreme Vampire Lords[/url]﻿
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/93384/93384-1535801746-208245069.jpeg[/img]
[/b][/size][/color][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90000][size=6]SAVAGE BEAR [/size][/url][size=5]﻿by [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/20882614][size=4]Rougeshot
﻿
[/size][/url][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/90000/90000-1521074778-678009436.jpeg[/img]﻿[/center]

author: Rougeshot
